entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 7:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to freezing rain or ice pellets in the afternoon then to rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain or ice pellets late in the evening then to snow or ice pellets before morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the coast overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
